statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT game_name, release_year FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT game_name, developer FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE release_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE developer = 'Oculus';
SELECT game_name, rating FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT AVG(rating) FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT MAX(release_year) FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT game_name, release_year, rating FROM virtual_reality_games ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT game_name, release_year, rating FROM virtual_reality_games ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_games LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE developer LIKE 'Sony%';
SELECT game_name, rating FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT game_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM virtual_reality_games GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT developer, COUNT(*) AS game_count FROM virtual_reality_games GROUP BY developer;
SELECT DISTINCT developer FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT game_name, rating, ABS(rating - 4.5) AS rating_difference FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT game_name, rating, CASE WHEN rating > 4 THEN 'High Rating' ELSE 'Low Rating' END AS rating_category FROM virtual_reality_games;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE game_id IN (1, 5, 10, 15);
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT device_name, brand FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, brand, release_year FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT device_id, brand FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT device_name, release_year FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_devices WHERE release_year > 2015;
SELECT device_name FROM virtual_reality_devices WHERE brand = 'Oculus';
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_devices WHERE device_id = '12345';
SELECT brand FROM virtual_reality_devices WHERE release_year < 2020;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%VR%';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM virtual_reality_devices WHERE release_year = 2018;
SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT MAX(release_year) AS max_release_year FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT MIN(release_year) AS min_release_year FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT AVG(release_year) AS avg_release_year FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT SUM(release_year) AS total_release_years FROM virtual_reality_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, brand FROM virtual_reality_devices ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT device_name, brand FROM virtual_reality_devices ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_reality_devices LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityCompany;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityProduct;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityUser;
SELECT id, name FROM VirtualRealityCompany WHERE founded_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT product_name, release_date FROM VirtualRealityProduct WHERE price > 500;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityUser WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT username, email FROM VirtualRealityUser WHERE age <= 30;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityProduct WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, username, email FROM VirtualRealityUser WHERE device_type = 'Oculus';
SELECT product_name, price FROM VirtualRealityProduct WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM VirtualRealityProduct ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT company_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM VirtualRealityProduct GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM VirtualRealityProduct;
SELECT company_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM VirtualRealityProduct GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT companyName, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM VirtualRealityProduct INNER JOIN VirtualRealityCompany ON VirtualRealityProduct.company_id = VirtualRealityCompany.id GROUP BY companyName;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityUser WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityProduct WHERE product_name LIKE '%VR%';
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityCompany WHERE headquarters IN ('California', 'New York');
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityProduct WHERE price < (SELECT AVG(price) FROM VirtualRealityProduct);
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityUser WHERE age IN (20, 25, 30);
SELECT * FROM vr_headsets;
SELECT brand, model FROM vr_headsets;
SELECT * FROM vr_games;
SELECT title, genre FROM vr_games;
SELECT * FROM vr_users;
SELECT username, age FROM vr_users;
SELECT * FROM vr_reviews;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM vr_reviews;
SELECT h.brand, r.rating FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id;
SELECT g.title, u.username FROM vr_games g JOIN vr_reviews r ON g.id = r.headset_id JOIN vr_users u ON r.user_id = u.id;
SELECT h.brand, r.rating, u.username FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id JOIN vr_users u ON r.user_id = u.id;
SELECT h.brand, h.model, u.username, r.rating FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id JOIN vr_users u ON r.user_id = u.id;
SELECT h.brand, h.model, g.title, r.rating, u.username FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id JOIN vr_users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN vr_games g ON r.headset_id = g.id;

SELECT h.brand, h.model, g.title, r.rating, u.username FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id JOIN vr_users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN vr_games g ON r.headset_id = g.id WHERE r.rating > 3;

SELECT h.brand, h.model, g.title, r.rating, u.username FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id JOIN vr_users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN vr_games g ON r.headset_id = g.id ORDER BY r.rating DESC;
SELECT AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM vr_reviews r;
SELECT h.brand, COUNT(r.id) AS review_count FROM vr_headsets h JOIN vr_reviews r ON h.id = r.headset_id GROUP BY h.brand;
SELECT u.location, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM vr_users u JOIN vr_reviews r ON u.id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.location;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityGames;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM VirtualRealityGames;
SELECT * FROM GameReviews;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM GameReviews;
SELECT * FROM Accessories;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM Accessories;
SELECT * FROM VirtualRealityCompanies;
SELECT company_name, foundation_date FROM VirtualRealityCompanies;
SELECT user_id, username, email, last_login FROM Users;
SELECT game_id, game_title, release_date, genre FROM VirtualRealityGames;
SELECT review_id, game_id, user_id, review_text, rating FROM GameReviews;
SELECT accessory_id, accessory_name, price, compatible_with_game FROM Accessories;
SELECT company_id, company_name, foundation_date, headquarters_city FROM VirtualRealityCompanies;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, release_date, genre FROM VirtualRealityGames WHERE game_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE game_id = 1 AND user_id = 1;
SELECT accessory_name, price FROM Accessories WHERE accessory_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, foundation_date, headquarters_city FROM VirtualRealityCompanies WHERE company_id = 1;
